INTRODUCTION.TEXT:
Hello, My name is Maksym Maksymyshyn.
This application was developed for BSC company as a test exercise to demonstrate my skills in the Angular framework and TypeScript programming language.
There are Bootstrap, Kendo, RxJs, SweetAlert2 were used in this application.
To start use this application run in command line next command:
json-server --watch db.json
After that 'Users' tab will be available and you can add, edit and delete users in application.
